page.title: 11A day of a one pound note.
page.content: Hello, I'm a pound note. I'm green have a picture of Queen Elizabeth II on one side and Sir Isaac Newton on the other. I am underneath the spring which stops the pound notes from moving around the till. The new coins have a seperate compartment. We pound notes find it above our dignity to mix with these new unpopular midgets.I was first placed here by a lady who came to this shop,{"Mace"}in{Hawks Road}to buy a pound of apples for 32p. While I was in her hand, I took a look at the shop. It had a shelf for bread and cakes by the window, a few shelves with household appliances, and shelves for food and drink. I could see {Mcvities chocolate biscuits}for 45p, {Bisto's gravy}for 30p and{Domestos {bleach}for 64p. A refridgerator stores cold food, a freezer stores frozen foods.
